name: HearthBeat (The Nervous Beehive)
description:
A Top Down Puzzle Game where you play as a heart who has limited hearth beats left and you must get to the exit. 

The game was inspired by HellTaker and a level was taken from it as my puzzles weren't great. 

WASD = Move

Arrow Keys = Push Movable Blocks 

Spikes retract in and out every turn 

The game still needs some more work with the UI and maybe adding enemys so i will be updating the game after the jam. 

And Most Importantly Hope You Enjoy
